abstract: Hedieh Ghaffarian, who was born in Iran and raised in California, will be the next chief White House florist, announced the office of the first lady, Michelle Obama.

headline.main: Iranian Immigrant Is Named White House Florist

snippet: Hedieh Ghaffarian, who was born in Iran and raised in California, will be the next chief White House florist, announced the office of the first lady, Michelle Obama.
